metro.GameScreen

Class Toolbar

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • metro.GameScreen.GameScreen
        • metro.GameScreen.Toolbar

  • public class Toolbar
extends GameScreen
    This is the bar on the side with the "build station", "build tracks", "show line view" and "create train" buttons.
    Author:
    hauke
